description:
(Play in fullscreen, and fullscreen during load... or download the desktop version for proper resolution)

201, The number of the Hue used in this Monochromatic Metroidvania. Escape from the Beast Facility using the Power ups you find during the game.  The You Win screen is a bit subjective,  if you even make it to the top. Have fun! 

Movement:  WASD/ Left Right Keys/ Space

LMB: Shoot (When the upgrade is found)

Let me know what you think! As my first project I would love to see any feedback.

Thanks for playing, This is my first Game Jam, and itch project. I've been developing games since Macromedia Flash 5, and I'm glad to Use Godot for this ALPHA game.

Music featured, Using the Creative Commons License Agreement
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1021837

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/842668

https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/989361

Remember Newgrounds? I do too.

Sfx from Itch.io resources and libraries found online.

Graphics are Original, Done in Graphics Gale.
Like what you see? Wanna see more? https://ko-fi.com/skald
